preCopyScript.value:
if   object_id('@{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}STG.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME}') is not null  
  truncate table @{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}STG.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME}

MERGE.defaultValue: DELETE FROM [CK].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB]      WHERE EXISTS  (     SELECT TOP 1 1      FROM [CKSTG].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB]       WHERE  [CKSTG].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[ORDER_NO] = [CK].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[ORDER_NO]  AND [CKSTG].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[LINE_NO] = [CK].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[LINE_NO]  AND [CKSTG].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[REL_NO] = [CK].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[REL_NO]  AND [CKSTG].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[LINE_ITEM_NO] = [CK].[CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[LINE_ITEM_NO])

STGSQL.defaultValue: select ORDER_NO, LINE_NO, REL_NO, LINE_ITEM_NO, CUSTOMER_NO, REPLACE(CATALOG_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CATALOG_NO, CONTRACT, PRE_ACCOUNTING_ID, BONUS_BASIS, BONUS_VALUE, NOTE_ID, REPLACE(ORDER_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  ORDER_CODE, LINE_TOTAL_QTY, REPLACE(PART_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PART_NO, LINE_TOTAL_WEIGHT, REPLACE(NOTE_TEXT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  NOTE_TEXT, ORDER_DISCOUNT, REPLACE(SALES_UNIT_MEAS, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SALES_UNIT_MEAS, PRICE_CONV_FACTOR, BASE_SALE_UNIT_PRICE, BUY_QTY_DUE, REPLACE(CATALOG_DESC, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CATALOG_DESC, QTY_TO_SHIP, REPLACE(CATALOG_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CATALOG_TYPE, CONV_FACTOR, COST, REPLACE(DELIVERY_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  DELIVERY_TYPE, TO_CHAR(DATE_ENTERED,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') DATE_ENTERED, DISCOUNT, TO_CHAR(PLANNED_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') PLANNED_DELIVERY_DATE, TO_CHAR(SUPPLY_SITE_DUE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') SUPPLY_SITE_DUE_DATE, TO_CHAR(PLANNED_DUE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') PLANNED_DUE_DATE, TO_CHAR(PROMISED_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') PROMISED_DELIVERY_DATE, QTY_ASSIGNED, QTY_INVOICED, QTY_ON_ORDER, QTY_RETURNED, QTY_SHIPDIFF, QTY_SHIPPED, TO_CHAR(REAL_SHIP_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') REAL_SHIP_DATE, QTY_SHORT, REVISED_QTY_DUE, SALE_UNIT_PRICE, REPLACE(SUPPLY_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SUPPLY_CODE, TO_CHAR(WANTED_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') WANTED_DELIVERY_DATE, QTY_PICKED, VENDOR_NO, FEE_CODE, CURRENCY_RATE, REPLACE(CUSTOMER_PART_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CUSTOMER_PART_NO, REPLACE(CUSTOMER_PART_UNIT_MEAS, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CUSTOMER_PART_UNIT_MEAS, CUSTOMER_PART_CONV_FACTOR, CUSTOMER_PART_BUY_QTY, REPLACE(CONSIGNMENT_STOCK, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CONSIGNMENT_STOCK, CLOSE_TOLERANCE, REPLACE(PRICE_LIST_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PRICE_LIST_NO, REPLACE(CHARGED_ITEM, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CHARGED_ITEM, REPLACE(DEMAND_ORDER_REF1, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  DEMAND_ORDER_REF1, DEMAND_ORDER_REF2, DEMAND_ORDER_REF3, DEMAND_ORDER_REF4, REPLACE(DEMAND_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  DEMAND_CODE, DOP_CONNECTION, WARRANTY, REPLACE(CREATE_SM_OBJECT_OPTION, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CREATE_SM_OBJECT_OPTION, TO_CHAR(PLANNED_SHIP_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PLANNED_SHIP_DATE, REPLACE(PLANNED_SHIP_PERIOD, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PLANNED_SHIP_PERIOD, DEFAULT_ADDR_FLAG, ADDR_FLAG, SHIP_ADDR_NO, REPLACE(ROUTE_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  ROUTE_ID, REPLACE(FORWARD_AGENT_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  FORWARD_AGENT_ID, SHIP_VIA_CODE, REPLACE(SHIP_VIA_DESC, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SHIP_VIA_DESC, DELIVERY_TERMS, REPLACE(DELIVERY_TERMS_DESC, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  DELIVERY_TERMS_DESC, DELIVERY_LEADTIME, REPLACE(DISTRICT_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  DISTRICT_CODE, REPLACE(REGION_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  REGION_CODE, DESIRED_QTY, REPLACE(PURCHASE_PART_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PURCHASE_PART_NO, REPLACE(STAGED_BILLING, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  STAGED_BILLING, VAT, REPLACE(ORIGINAL_PART_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  ORIGINAL_PART_NO, REPLACE(SM_CONNECTION, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SM_CONNECTION, SUP_SM_CONTRACT, REPLACE(SUP_SM_OBJECT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SUP_SM_OBJECT, PART_PRICE, REPLACE(PRICE_SOURCE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PRICE_SOURCE, CALC_CHAR_PRICE, CHAR_PRICE, PRICE_FREEZE, REPLACE(DOCK_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  DOCK_CODE, REPLACE(SUB_DOCK_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SUB_DOCK_CODE, REPLACE(REF_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  REF_ID, REPLACE(LOCATION_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  LOCATION_NO, REPLACE(CONFIGURATION_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CONFIGURATION_ID, TO_CHAR(PRICE_EFFECTIVITY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PRICE_EFFECTIVITY_DATE, CONFIGURED_LINE_PRICE_ID, TO_CHAR(EARLIEST_START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') EARLIEST_START_DATE, REPLACE(CTP_PLANNED, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CTP_PLANNED, REPLACE(JOB_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  JOB_ID, CUST_WARRANTY_ID, REPLACE(PRICE_SOURCE_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PRICE_SOURCE_ID, REPLACE(INTRASTAT_EXEMPT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  INTRASTAT_EXEMPT, REPLACE(PRICE_UNIT_MEAS, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PRICE_UNIT_MEAS, ADDITIONAL_DISCOUNT, REPLACE(CONDITION_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CONDITION_CODE, REPLACE(PART_OWNERSHIP, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PART_OWNERSHIP, REPLACE(OWNING_CUSTOMER_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  OWNING_CUSTOMER_NO, REPLACE(EXCHANGE_ITEM, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  EXCHANGE_ITEM, REPLACE(SUPPLY_SITE_RESERVE_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SUPPLY_SITE_RESERVE_TYPE, ORIGINATING_REL_NO, ORIGINATING_LINE_ITEM_NO, REPLACE(RELEASE_PLANNING, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  RELEASE_PLANNING, SUPPLIER_SHIP_VIA_TRANSIT, REPLACE(SUPPLIER_SHIP_VIA_TRANSIT_DESC, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SUPPLIER_SHIP_VIA_TRANSIT_DESC, SUPPLY_SITE, REPLACE(CANCEL_REASON, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  CANCEL_REASON, ROWSTATE, TO_CHAR(ROWVERSION,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') ROWVERSION, SALE_UNIT_PRICE_WITH_TAX, TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') SALES_DATE, REPLACE(ACR_WITH_SALES_POSTING, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  ACR_WITH_SALES_POSTING, SALES_AMOUNT, INVOICE_AMOUNT, PREL_VOUCHER_NO, REPLACE(N_CUST_RELEASE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  N_CUST_RELEASE_NO, TO_CHAR(N_PRICE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') N_PRICE_DATE, N_PRICE_FLAG, N_COMPARE_FLAG, N_CONFIRM_FLAG, REPLACE(SHIP_TIME, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  SHIP_TIME, REPLACE(N_RECEIVE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  N_RECEIVE_NO, REPLACE(C_BACK_ORDER_LINE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  C_BACK_ORDER_LINE_NO, REPLACE(C_FINAL_CUSTOMER, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  C_FINAL_CUSTOMER, REPLACE(PO_LINE_INFO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '')  PO_LINE_INFO from IFSAPP.CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE_TAB  where TO_CHAR(ROWVERSION, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') >
